history.proof: intros d a t Hrefok Hreconnaissance. inversion Hreconnaissance. apply rec_co_dta with ladj; auto. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t

Premises:
Inductive reconnaissance_co : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t with state_reconnait_co : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> state_reconnait_co d s b (app c tl) with liste_reconnait_co : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> term_list -> Prop := rec_co_empty : forall (d : preDTA) (b : ad), liste_reconnait_co
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list

FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set

preDTA = Map state : Set
ad = N : Set
rec_co_def_3 = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t : term -> Prop
rec_co_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> coacc d a0 a1 -> reconnaissance_co d a a0 t
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t

rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t

semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r

rec_co_def_4 = fun (d : preDTA) (l : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall a : ad, preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop

sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
Inductive reconnaissance_co : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> reconnaissance_co d a b t with state_reconnait_co : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_co_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> state_reconnait_co d s b (app c tl) with liste_reconnait_co : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait_co d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl)

predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_1 d ladj t s -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
liste_reconnait_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (b : ad), P d prec_empty b tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (b : ad) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance_co d a b hd -> liste_reconnait_co d la b tl -> P d la b tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (b : ad) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait_co d ls b (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls b (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl)) ->...-> P p p0 a t
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
rec_co_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait_co d ladj b t), rec_co_def_1 d ladj b t s -> forall c : coacc d b a, rec_co_def_0 d a b t (rec_co_dta d a b t ladj e s c)
state_reconnait_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> P d s b (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co p s a t -> P p s a t
rec_co_7 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> rec_co_def_4 d la tl -> rec_co_def_4 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)

rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (r : reconnaissance d a hd), predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 d a hd r -> forall l : liste_reconnait d la tl, predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d la tl l -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (rec_consi d a la ls hd tl r l)
semantic_equiv_1_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (r : reconnaissance d a hd), dta_reconnait d a hd r -> forall l : liste_reconnait d la tl, pre_reconnait d la tl l -> pre_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (rec_consi d a la ls hd tl r l)
rec_co_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (b : ad) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance_co d a b hd -> liste_reconnait_co d la b tl -> liste_reconnait_co d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl)
rec_co_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (b : ad) (tl : term_list) (r : reconnaissance_co d a b hd), rec_co_def_0 d a b hd r -> forall l : liste_reconnait_co d la b tl, rec_co_def_2 d la b tl l -> rec_co_def_2 d (prec_cons a la ls) b (tcons hd tl) (rec_co_consi d a la ls hd b tl r l)
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
predta_coacc_0_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states_0 d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0

```coq
intros d a t Hrefok Hreconnaissance. inversion Hreconnaissance.
apply rec_co_dta with ladj; assumption.
Qed.
```
